name: Infinite Blue Generator
description:
A chatroom generator for Infinite Blue by @Velvet Fox Games.

Play Infinite Blue on Android

Play Infinite Blue on iOS

Sign up to be notified of the Kickstarter launch on May 17th!

IMPORTANT:

Due to browser updates, the web build currently does not work on Chrome or Safari. For best results, try running the game in Firefox or downloading it for your platform of choice (Windows, Linux, or Mac) below.

HOW TO USE:

Simply start the game on your platform of choice (see above) and get to editing.

Participants: Check off characters to appear as present in the chat along the header.

Main Character Name: Enter the name for the main character here

Active Character: Click the profile picture/speech bubble to change who will post the dialogue.

Enter/Leave message: Click these to add messages like "Rory has entered the chat" and "Leo is now offline" to the chat.

Insert Text Here: Click the white box to begin typing in dialogue to be said in the chat. Either hit enter or the "Add to chat" button to add it to the chat log.

Clear Chat: Click this to clear all messages from the chat

Remove last message: This removes the most recently added message from the chat. Click this as many times as you like.

Chat preview: Here you can see a small preview of what messages are being added to the chat

View chat: Click this to view the whole conversation in the chatroom. You can scroll up and down to view more of it if the chat is very long. Click the back button to return to the editor.

Press "S" on the chat screen to save a screenshot of it.

Feel free to tag @VelvetFoxGames (Twitter) or @velvetfoxgames (Tumblr) with any screenshots you make!
